author: Prof Luke Clancy
title: Do you smoke or vape? Here’s why Covid-19 means you should quit right now
description: Smoking-damaged lungs leave you at far greater risk from a coronavirus attack
content: Covid-19 is changing our lives, maybe for ever, and remarkable efforts are being made to save peoples lives. Action on smoking and vaping cessation must become part of these efforts because, already, data clearly show the influence of smoking on the disease c… [+6001 chars]
